summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Pure Equity Trust platform with PDF generation for all 4 document types. Backend APIs fully functional, frontend UI working with updated role descriptions, and PDF generation operational for declaration_of_trust, trust_transfer_grant_deed, notice_of_intent, and affidavit_of_fact document types.
passed_tests: Backend health check and root endpoint
Templates endpoint returns all 4 document types
PDF generation for Declaration of Trust
PDF generation for Trust Transfer Grant Deed
PDF generation for Notice of Intent to Preserve Interest
PDF generation for Affidavit of Fact
Authentication flow with Google login button
Document creation flow with all 4 templates
EditTrust page with updated role descriptions
Form fields for Grantor/Settlor, Trustee, Beneficiary
Save and Download PDF buttons functional

success_percentage.frontend: 95% - All major UI flows working, minor browser stability issue
success_percentage.pdf_generation: 100% - All 4 document types generate valid PDFs
